paper.title: A Question Answering System Supported by Information Extraction
paper.venue: Conference on Applied Natural Language Processing
paper.abstract: This paper discusses an information extraction (IE) system, Textract, in natural language (NL) question answering (QA) and examines the role of IE in QA application. It shows: (i) Named Entity tagging is an important component for QA, (ii) an NL shallow parser provides a structural basis for questions, and (iii) high-level domain independent IE can result in a QA breakthrough.
